00023 struct b3GpuRaycastInternalData
00024 {
00025         cl_context m_context;
00026         cl_device_id m_device;
00027         cl_command_queue  m_q;
00028         cl_kernel m_raytraceKernel;
00029         cl_kernel m_raytracePairsKernel;
00030         cl_kernel m_findRayRigidPairIndexRanges;
00031         
00032         b3GpuParallelLinearBvh* m_plbvh;
00033         b3RadixSort32CL* m_radixSorter;
00034         b3FillCL* m_fill;
00035         
00036         //1 element per ray
00037         b3OpenCLArray<b3RayInfo>* m_gpuRays;
00038         b3OpenCLArray<b3RayHit>* m_gpuHitResults;
00039         b3OpenCLArray<int>* m_firstRayRigidPairIndexPerRay;
00040         b3OpenCLArray<int>* m_numRayRigidPairsPerRay;
00041         
00042         //1 element per (ray index, rigid index) pair, where the ray intersects with the rigid's AABB
00043         b3OpenCLArray<int>* m_gpuNumRayRigidPairs;
00044         b3OpenCLArray<b3Int2>* m_gpuRayRigidPairs;      //x == ray index, y == rigid index
00045         
00046         int m_test;
00047 };
00048 
00049 b3GpuRaycast::b3GpuRaycast(cl_context ctx,cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue  q)
00050 {
00051         m_data = new b3GpuRaycastInternalData;
00052         m_data->m_context = ctx;
00053         m_data->m_device = device;
00054         m_data->m_q = q;
00055         m_data->m_raytraceKernel = 0;
00056         m_data->m_raytracePairsKernel = 0;
00057         m_data->m_findRayRigidPairIndexRanges = 0;
00058 
00059         m_data->m_plbvh = new b3GpuParallelLinearBvh(ctx, device, q);
00060         m_data->m_radixSorter = new b3RadixSort32CL(ctx, device, q);
00061         m_data->m_fill = new b3FillCL(ctx, device, q);
00062         
00063         m_data->m_gpuRays = new b3OpenCLArray<b3RayInfo>(ctx, q);
00064         m_data->m_gpuHitResults = new b3OpenCLArray<b3RayHit>(ctx, q);
00065         m_data->m_firstRayRigidPairIndexPerRay = new b3OpenCLArray<int>(ctx, q);
00066         m_data->m_numRayRigidPairsPerRay = new b3OpenCLArray<int>(ctx, q);
00067         m_data->m_gpuNumRayRigidPairs = new b3OpenCLArray<int>(ctx, q);
00068         m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs = new b3OpenCLArray<b3Int2>(ctx, q);
00069 
00070         {
00071                 cl_int errNum=0;
00072                 cl_program prog = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLProgramFromString(m_data->m_context,m_data->m_device,rayCastKernelCL,&errNum,"",B3_RAYCAST_PATH);
00073                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00074                 m_data->m_raytraceKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_data->m_context, m_data->m_device,rayCastKernelCL, "rayCastKernel",&errNum,prog);
00075                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00076                 m_data->m_raytracePairsKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_data->m_context, m_data->m_device,rayCastKernelCL, "rayCastPairsKernel",&errNum,prog);
00077                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00078                 m_data->m_findRayRigidPairIndexRanges = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_data->m_context, m_data->m_device,rayCastKernelCL, "findRayRigidPairIndexRanges",&errNum,prog);
00079                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00080                 clReleaseProgram(prog);
00081         }
00082 
00083 
00084 }

00086 b3GpuRaycast::~b3GpuRaycast()
00087 {
00088         clReleaseKernel(m_data->m_raytraceKernel);
00089         clReleaseKernel(m_data->m_raytracePairsKernel);
00090         clReleaseKernel(m_data->m_findRayRigidPairIndexRanges);
00091         
00092         delete m_data->m_plbvh;
00093         delete m_data->m_radixSorter;
00094         delete m_data->m_fill;
00095         
00096         delete m_data->m_gpuRays;
00097         delete m_data->m_gpuHitResults;
00098         delete m_data->m_firstRayRigidPairIndexPerRay;
00099         delete m_data->m_numRayRigidPairsPerRay;
00100         delete m_data->m_gpuNumRayRigidPairs;
00101         delete m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs;
00102         
00103         delete m_data;
00104 }

00106 bool sphere_intersect(const b3Vector3& spherePos,  b3Scalar radius, const b3Vector3& rayFrom, const b3Vector3& rayTo, float& hitFraction)
00107 {
00108     b3Vector3 rs = rayFrom - spherePos;
00109         b3Vector3 rayDir = rayTo-rayFrom;
00110         
00111         float A = b3Dot(rayDir,rayDir);
00112     float B = b3Dot(rs, rayDir);
00113     float C = b3Dot(rs, rs) - (radius * radius);
00114     
00115         float D = B * B - A*C;
00116 
00117     if (D > 0.0)
00118     {
00119         float t = (-B - sqrt(D))/A;
00120 
00121         if ( (t >= 0.0f) && (t < hitFraction) )
00122         {
00123                         hitFraction = t;
00124             return true;
00125                 }
00126         }
00127         return false;
00128 }
00129 
00130 bool rayConvex(const b3Vector3& rayFromLocal, const b3Vector3& rayToLocal, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& poly,
00131         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& faces,  float& hitFraction, b3Vector3& hitNormal)
00132 {
00133         float exitFraction = hitFraction;
00134         float enterFraction = -0.1f;
00135         b3Vector3 curHitNormal=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00136         for (int i=0;i<poly.m_numFaces;i++)
00137         {
00138                 const b3GpuFace& face = faces[poly.m_faceOffset+i];
00139                 float fromPlaneDist = b3Dot(rayFromLocal,face.m_plane)+face.m_plane.w;
00140                 float toPlaneDist = b3Dot(rayToLocal,face.m_plane)+face.m_plane.w;
00141                 if (fromPlaneDist<0.f)
00142                 {
00143                         if (toPlaneDist >= 0.f)
00144                         {
00145                                 float fraction = fromPlaneDist / (fromPlaneDist-toPlaneDist);
00146                                 if (exitFraction>fraction)
00147                                 {
00148                                         exitFraction = fraction;
00149                                 }
00150                         }                       
00151                 } else
00152                 {
00153                         if (toPlaneDist<0.f)
00154                         {
00155                                 float fraction = fromPlaneDist / (fromPlaneDist-toPlaneDist);
00156                                 if (enterFraction <= fraction)
00157                                 {
00158                                         enterFraction = fraction;
00159                                         curHitNormal = face.m_plane;
00160                                         curHitNormal.w = 0.f;
00161                                 }
00162                         } else
00163                         {
00164                                 return false;
00165                         }
00166                 }
00167                 if (exitFraction <= enterFraction)
00168                         return false;
00169         }
00170 
00171         if (enterFraction < 0.f)
00172                 return false;
00173 
00174         hitFraction = enterFraction;
00175         hitNormal = curHitNormal;
00176         return true;
00177 }
00178 
00179 void b3GpuRaycast::castRaysHost(const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RayInfo>& rays,    b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RayHit>& hitResults,
00180                 int numBodies,const struct b3RigidBodyData* bodies, int numCollidables,const struct b3Collidable* collidables, const struct b3GpuNarrowPhaseInternalData* narrowphaseData)
00181 {
00182 
00183 //      return castRays(rays,hitResults,numBodies,bodies,numCollidables,collidables);
00184 
00185         B3_PROFILE("castRaysHost");
00186         for (int r=0;r<rays.size();r++)
00187         {
00188                 b3Vector3 rayFrom = rays[r].m_from;
00189                 b3Vector3 rayTo = rays[r].m_to;
00190                 float hitFraction = hitResults[r].m_hitFraction;
00191 
00192                 int hitBodyIndex= -1;
00193                 b3Vector3 hitNormal;
00194 
00195                 for (int b=0;b<numBodies;b++)
00196                 {
00197                                 
00198                         const b3Vector3& pos = bodies[b].m_pos;
00199                         //const b3Quaternion& orn = bodies[b].m_quat;
00200                         
00201                         switch (collidables[bodies[b].m_collidableIdx].m_shapeType)
00202                         {
00203                         case SHAPE_SPHERE:
00204                                 {
00205                                         b3Scalar radius = collidables[bodies[b].m_collidableIdx].m_radius;
00206                                         if (sphere_intersect(pos,  radius, rayFrom, rayTo,hitFraction))
00207                                         {
00208                                                 hitBodyIndex = b;
00209                                                 b3Vector3 hitPoint;
00210                                                 hitPoint.setInterpolate3(rays[r].m_from, rays[r].m_to,hitFraction);
00211                                                 hitNormal = (hitPoint-bodies[b].m_pos).normalize();
00212                                         }
00213                                 }
00214                         case SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL:
00215                                 {
00216 
00217                                         b3Transform convexWorldTransform;
00218                                         convexWorldTransform.setIdentity();
00219                                         convexWorldTransform.setOrigin(bodies[b].m_pos);
00220                                         convexWorldTransform.setRotation(bodies[b].m_quat);
00221                                         b3Transform convexWorld2Local = convexWorldTransform.inverse();
00222 
00223                                         b3Vector3 rayFromLocal = convexWorld2Local(rayFrom);
00224                                         b3Vector3 rayToLocal = convexWorld2Local(rayTo);
00225                                         
00226                                         
00227                                         int shapeIndex = collidables[bodies[b].m_collidableIdx].m_shapeIndex;
00228                                         const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& poly = narrowphaseData->m_convexPolyhedra[shapeIndex];
00229                                         if (rayConvex(rayFromLocal, rayToLocal,poly,narrowphaseData->m_convexFaces, hitFraction, hitNormal))
00230                                         {
00231                                                 hitBodyIndex = b;
00232                                         }
00233 
00234                                         
00235                                         break;
00236                                 }
00237                         default:
00238                                 {
00239                                         static bool once=true;
00240                                         if (once)
00241                                         {
00242                                                 once=false;
00243                                                 b3Warning("Raytest: unsupported shape type\n");
00244                                         }
00245                                 }
00246                         }
00247                 }
00248                 if (hitBodyIndex>=0)
00249                 {
00250 
00251                         hitResults[r].m_hitFraction = hitFraction;
00252                         hitResults[r].m_hitPoint.setInterpolate3(rays[r].m_from, rays[r].m_to,hitFraction);
00253                         hitResults[r].m_hitNormal = hitNormal;
00254                         hitResults[r].m_hitBody = hitBodyIndex;
00255                 }
00256 
00257         }
00258 }
00260 void b3GpuRaycast::castRays(const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RayInfo>& rays,        b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RayHit>& hitResults,
00261                 int numBodies,const struct b3RigidBodyData* bodies, int numCollidables, const struct b3Collidable* collidables, 
00262                 const struct b3GpuNarrowPhaseInternalData* narrowphaseData,     class b3GpuBroadphaseInterface* broadphase)
00263 {
00264         //castRaysHost(rays,hitResults,numBodies,bodies,numCollidables,collidables,narrowphaseData);
00265 
00266         B3_PROFILE("castRaysGPU");
00267         
00268         {
00269                 B3_PROFILE("raycast copyFromHost");
00270                 m_data->m_gpuRays->copyFromHost(rays);
00271                 m_data->m_gpuHitResults->copyFromHost(hitResults);
00272                 
00273         }
00274         
00275         int numRays = hitResults.size();
00276         {
00277                 m_data->m_firstRayRigidPairIndexPerRay->resize(numRays);
00278                 m_data->m_numRayRigidPairsPerRay->resize(numRays);
00279                 
00280                 m_data->m_gpuNumRayRigidPairs->resize(1);
00281                 m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs->resize(numRays * 16);
00282         }
00283         
00284         //run kernel
00285         const bool USE_BRUTE_FORCE_RAYCAST = false;
00286         if(USE_BRUTE_FORCE_RAYCAST)
00287         {
00288                 B3_PROFILE("raycast launch1D");
00289 
00290                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_data->m_q,m_data->m_raytraceKernel,"m_raytraceKernel");
00291                 int numRays = rays.size();
00292                 launcher.setConst(numRays);
00293 
00294                 launcher.setBuffer(m_data->m_gpuRays->getBufferCL());
00295                 launcher.setBuffer(m_data->m_gpuHitResults->getBufferCL());
00296 
00297                 launcher.setConst(numBodies);
00298                 launcher.setBuffer(narrowphaseData->m_bodyBufferGPU->getBufferCL());
00299                 launcher.setBuffer(narrowphaseData->m_collidablesGPU->getBufferCL());
00300                 launcher.setBuffer(narrowphaseData->m_convexFacesGPU->getBufferCL());
00301                 launcher.setBuffer(narrowphaseData->m_convexPolyhedraGPU->getBufferCL());
00302                 
00303                 launcher.launch1D(numRays);
00304                 clFinish(m_data->m_q);
00305         }
00306         else
00307         {
00308                 m_data->m_plbvh->build( broadphase->getAllAabbsGPU(), broadphase->getSmallAabbIndicesGPU(), broadphase->getLargeAabbIndicesGPU() );
00309 
00310                 m_data->m_plbvh->testRaysAgainstBvhAabbs(*m_data->m_gpuRays, *m_data->m_gpuNumRayRigidPairs, *m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs);
00311                 
00312                 int numRayRigidPairs = -1;
00313                 m_data->m_gpuNumRayRigidPairs->copyToHostPointer(&numRayRigidPairs, 1);
00314                 if( numRayRigidPairs > m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs->size() )
00315                 {
00316                         numRayRigidPairs = m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs->size();
00317                         m_data->m_gpuNumRayRigidPairs->copyFromHostPointer(&numRayRigidPairs, 1);
00318                 }
00319                 
00320                 m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs->resize(numRayRigidPairs);   //Radix sort needs b3OpenCLArray::size() to be correct
00321                 
00322                 //Sort ray-rigid pairs by ray index
00323                 {
00324                         B3_PROFILE("sort ray-rigid pairs");
00325                         m_data->m_radixSorter->execute( *reinterpret_cast< b3OpenCLArray<b3SortData>* >(m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs) );
00326                 }
00327                 
00328                 //detect start,count of each ray pair
00329                 {
00330                         B3_PROFILE("detect ray-rigid pair index ranges");
00331                         
00332                         {
00333                                 B3_PROFILE("reset ray-rigid pair index ranges");
00334                                 
00335                                 m_data->m_fill->execute(*m_data->m_firstRayRigidPairIndexPerRay, numRayRigidPairs, numRays);    //atomic_min used to find first index
00336                                 m_data->m_fill->execute(*m_data->m_numRayRigidPairsPerRay, 0, numRays);
00337                                 clFinish(m_data->m_q);
00338                         }
00339                         
00340                         b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00341                         {
00342                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs->getBufferCL() ),
00343                                 
00344                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_data->m_firstRayRigidPairIndexPerRay->getBufferCL() ),
00345                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_data->m_numRayRigidPairsPerRay->getBufferCL() )
00346                         };
00347                         
00348                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_data->m_q, m_data->m_findRayRigidPairIndexRanges, "m_findRayRigidPairIndexRanges");
00349                         launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00350                         launcher.setConst(numRayRigidPairs);
00351                         
00352                         launcher.launch1D(numRayRigidPairs);
00353                         clFinish(m_data->m_q);
00354                 }
00355                 
00356                 {
00357                         B3_PROFILE("ray-rigid intersection");
00358                         
00359                         b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00360                         {
00361                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_data->m_gpuRays->getBufferCL() ),
00362                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_data->m_gpuHitResults->getBufferCL() ),
00363                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_data->m_firstRayRigidPairIndexPerRay->getBufferCL() ),
00364                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_data->m_numRayRigidPairsPerRay->getBufferCL() ),
00365                                 
00366                                 b3BufferInfoCL( narrowphaseData->m_bodyBufferGPU->getBufferCL() ),
00367                                 b3BufferInfoCL( narrowphaseData->m_collidablesGPU->getBufferCL() ),
00368                                 b3BufferInfoCL( narrowphaseData->m_convexFacesGPU->getBufferCL() ),
00369                                 b3BufferInfoCL( narrowphaseData->m_convexPolyhedraGPU->getBufferCL() ),
00370                                 
00371                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_data->m_gpuRayRigidPairs->getBufferCL() )
00372                         };
00373                         
00374                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_data->m_q, m_data->m_raytracePairsKernel, "m_raytracePairsKernel");
00375                         launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00376                         launcher.setConst(numRays);
00377                         
00378                         launcher.launch1D(numRays);
00379                         clFinish(m_data->m_q);
00380                 }
00381         }
00382         
00383         
00384 
00385         //copy results
00386         {
00387                 B3_PROFILE("raycast copyToHost");
00388                 m_data->m_gpuHitResults->copyToHost(hitResults);
00389         }
00390 
00391 }
